title: LTB The Finally 8 Cards for my NY Giants Team Set

posts.post_title: LTB The Finally 8 Cards for my NY Giants Team Set
posts.post_content:
looking to stick around the 2-3.5ish range in SGC holder

Red Ames hand at chest 
Red Ames hand above head  
Al Bridwell cap
Doc Crandall no cap
Larry Doyle Portrait 
Rube Marquard Follow Through 
Christy Mathewson White Cap 
Admiral Schlei Portrait 

Thanks for looking and hopefully we can work out a couple of deals
